ROM.Changelog:
# Note : _Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._ --- — Rebased launcher3 — Rebased gallery — Fixed qs pull down — Added toggle to pull down statusbar from right side to show qs panel — Fixed panel glitch — Screen pinning improvements — Themes improvement — Fixed some NPE's — Ambient music ticker improvement — Added statusbar clock customisation — Updated black theme — Tiles improvement — Added substratum service
Device Specific Changes :-
— Fixed camera crash — Kernel upstreamed to v3.18.94 — Goodix Improvements — Updated toolchain to linaro 7.2 — Hardcode Black level pattern and iso for ov13855 camera — Updated keylayout — Some more performance improvements — Fixed deep sleep issue — Latest CAF tag LA.UM.6.6.r1-06300-89xx.0
